column4: does anyone know why I might not be able to cd into a directory that I *can* ls? the directory is owned by both my user and group and has permissions ug+rw
you have access to the dir, but not the files/subdirs.  Grant perms with chmod -R
i've already done that several times. even this doesn't fix it:      root@xenu:/var/www# chmod -R ug+rw confluence/
